channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Sustainable investing advocate says ‘anti-woke’ backlash in US won’t stop the movement
item.description: Maria Lettini already knew about the backlash going on in the United States against ESG investing, which takes the environment, social issues and corporate governance into account, when she took over as chief executive of US SIF last year.

item.title: How Connie Chung launched a generation of Asian American girls named ‘Connie’ — and had no idea
item.description: Some public figures achieve immortality with buildings or monuments named after them. Veteran broadcaster Connie Chung has a namesake brand of marijuana, as well as hundreds of Asian-American women as a living legacy.

item.title: Will the Federal Reserve cut interest rates fast enough to deliver a ‘soft landing’?
item.description: American consumers and home buyers, business people and political leaders have been waiting for months for what the Federal Reserve is poised to announce this week: That it’s cutting its key interest rate from a two-decade peak.
